amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of those amendments made in order pursuant to an order of the House on September 19, 2001 which are printed on pages H5851-H5853 in the Congressional Record for September 20, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of amendments offered en bloc and made in order pursuant to the order of the House of September 19, 2001. The amendments contained in the en bloc proposal consist of the amendments originally proposed by the following Members: Messrs. Ose, Bereuter, Underwood, Gilchrest, Strickland, Ms. Velazquez, Mr. Stearns (#46), Mrs. Tauscher, Mr. Weldon of Pennsylvania (#'s 70 and 78), and Mrs. Kelly. Each amendment is as printed in the Congressional Record of September 19, 2001.

action.text: On agreeing to the Stump amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
